subtitle: Totally yummy any time of day.

method.text: Preheat oven to 180°C and preheat grill to a medium heat.
Place bread rounds on a baking tray. Brush both sides of each round with a little of the oil.
Place in the oven at 180°C and cook for 8-10 min until crispy and lightly golden.
Meanwhile, fold each rasher of bacon in half and grill for 3-5 min until crispy,
Break the eggs into poaching rings in a frying pan of simmering water. Simmer for 3-4 min until eggs are set.
Melt the butter in a frying pan. Add the garlic, seasoning and mushrooms and fry for 2-3 min until tender.
Place the tomato slices under the grill to warm through for 1 min.
To assemble the toastie: Place the tomato slices on the toast rounds topped with the bacon, egg and finally the mushrooms. Serve immediately.

title: Poached egg and bacon toastie
